HTM02 -01 B1 Carcus Test
Carcus test
Details
File number:
The following Pipeline Carcass Systems has been tested in accordance with Paragraph 15.47-15.51 and was found to comply with the following specifications:
During a test period of 2 hours, the maximum pressure loss should be ≤ 0.2 kPa for 400 kPa systems, ≤0.5kPa for 700 kPa systems, ≤ 0.2 kPa for vacuum & AGSS (plastic or copper).
Systems should be tested at a working pressure of;
For compressed medical gas systems - 10.0 bar (1,000 kPa);
For medical compressed air systems for surgical use - 18.0 bar (1,800 kPa);
For vacuum & AGSS systems constructed in copper 5.0 bar (500 kPa);
For vacuum & AGSS systems constructed in plastic 1 bar (100 kPa).
Gas Tested (Pass or Fail at end of test)
